sentences.english: Objective To study the emergency rescue of basicranial fracture complicated with massive hemorrhage.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討顱底骨折並鼻腔大出血的急診治療措施。

sentences.english: Lying in the emergency room looking pale.
sentences.chinese: 躺在急診室的她臉色看起很蒼白。

sentences.english: But this one was a Christmas emergency.
sentences.chinese: 但這的確是個聖誕節急診。

sentences.english: For example, many medical workers are convinced that the number of emergency cases increases during a full moon.
sentences.chinese: 例如，許多醫務工作者相信月圓時急診病例會增多。

sentences.english: Objective To analyze the characteristics of the drug poisoning.
sentences.chinese: 目的分析綜合醫院急診科藥物中毒的特點。

sentences.english: An afebrile elderly woman who suffered from left flank pain for 1 month visited the emergency department for help.
sentences.chinese: 一位體溫正常老婦人因左腰痛一個月到急診部門求醫。

sentences.english: Pain is one the most common reasons why patients seek emergency care.
sentences.chinese: 疼痛是急診病人尋求緊急醫療最常見的原因之一。

sentences.english: The old chart should accompany the patient from the ER to the patient ward where he's admitted.
sentences.chinese: 舊病歷應伴着病人從急診室送人病房。

sentences.english: We decide to take him to the ER.
sentences.chinese: 我們決定把他帶往急診室。

sentences.english: The emergency ward can now call directly for the competent specialist.
sentences.chinese: 現在急診科有了呼救權，可直接點名呼請有關專家。

sentences.english: Objective To standardize the management of out-patient intravenous service process.
sentences.chinese: 目的規範門急診輸液室服務流程的管理。

sentences.english: Objective To explore the effect of evidence-based nursing(EBN) in nursing rounds in emergency department.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討運用循證護理在急診科進行護理查房。

sentences.english: “My goal is to turn an acute-care emergency patient into an outpatient,” he declared.
sentences.chinese: “我的目標是把急診病人轉入門診部，”他說。

sentences.english: Objective To maker clear the Irrational Prescriptions in Outpatient and Emergency Departments in our Hospital promote reasonable use the medicine.
sentences.chinese: 目的瞭解我院門急診不合理用藥情況，促進合理用藥。

sentences.english: If this is not possible, go to your local hospital emergency department.
sentences.chinese: 如果這是不可能的，轉到您的當地醫院的急診部。

sentences.english: Then he was struck with a severe sinus infection, which led to two ER visits.
sentences.chinese: 後來，他患上嚴重的竇感染，曾兩次住進急診室。

definition: to see a doctor/to seek medical advice
waiting to see a doctor/awaiting treatment
to seek medical treatment/to see a doctor
intravenous infusion/to get put on an IV
to pass (sth) on (to sb else)/to transfer sb (to another hospital etc)
